name: FOG Readers
description: A 1:1 tutoring program for children enrolled in grades 1-4 who are struggling with reading. FOG Readers focuses on basic, fundamental reading skills. Students in the program increase their reading confidence, gain an average of a half-grade level in the first 3 months and read more at home for fun! We serve children who live or attend school in San Francisco. Students meet with an assigned tutor once a week for 45 minutes to an hour, online or at an SF Public Library location.

howToGetIt: To request a tutor, first attend a Parent/Guardian Orientation Session. Visit this webpage to learn more: https://sfpl.org/locations/main-library/bridge-main-5th-floor/fog-readers/signing-your-child-fog-readers-tutor
